# Government Tender Announcement
**Request for Standing Offers (RSO)**

## Request Overview
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites bids from qualified suppliers for the supply, delivery, and off-loading of warm beverages and brewing machines on an as-and-when-required basis.

## Procurement Details

- **Notice Reference**: PW-23-01021181
- **Solicitation Number**: M9424-23-1288 / A
- **Publication Date**: January 12, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: February 15, 2023 at 3:00 PM EST
- **Contracting Entity**: Royal Canadian Mounted Police

## Requirements
The successful bidder will be required to deliver:

- Coffee, hot chocolate, and flavored coffee
- Supply, installation, and maintenance of brewing machines

## Contract Duration
The contract period will be for one year, with an option to extend for up to two additional one-year periods.

## Evaluation Criteria
Offers must meet the requirements of the Request for Standing Offers and comply with the mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive.

## Submission and Evaluation
Bidders must submit their offers electronically to [NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca). The RCMP reserves the right to negotiate with any bidder on any procurement.

## Important Information

- Tenders must be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada
- Canada adopts the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada and incorporates the provisions of this regime into solicitation activities
- Canada retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement
- All amendments and significant inquiries received and their replies will be posted on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities)

## Additional Information
Attachments to the tender documents, including the Request for Standing Offer and Amendment 2, can be found online at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/). For more information, please contact Lianne Hopkie, SR Procurement Officer, at [lianne.hopkie@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:lianne.hopkie
